American workers should not be forced into a race to the bottom. They should not have to compete against manufacturing workers in Vietnam who make as little as 72 cents an hour.

Many people do not know that Black women are 243% more likely to die from pregnancy or childbirth-related causes. I introduced a resolution in the Senate officially designating this week as #BlackMaternalHealthWeek. We must raise awareness & address this issue.

Make no mistake about it: Trump is dead wrong. There is no way to resuscitate the job-killing Trans-Pacific Partnership without betraying the working families of our country. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/984631073865953280 QT @realDonaldTrump Would only join TPP if the deal were substantially better than the deal offered to Pres. Obama. We already have BILATERAL deals with six of the eleven nations in TPP, and are working to make a deal with the biggest of those  nations, Japan, who has hit us hard on trade for years!

The Constitution gives Congress the power to authorize military action. If @realDonaldTrump wants to expand American military involvement in Syria's civil war, he must seek approval from Congress – & provide a comprehensive strategy with clear goals & a plan to achieve them.(2/2)

We spoke up & reminded this Administration that public lands belong to all of us. Our voices made them pull back a proposal that would've caused entrance fees to skyrocket. This is great news, but we still have work to do to ensure everyone can access our National Parks.

Trump is right that it would be useful to take a serious look at the Postal Service. He's dead wrong, however, if he believes the solution is to privatize the Postal Service. The reality is that since 2014 the Postal Service has made an operating profit of more than $2.7 billion. https://twitter.com/CNN/status/984793345267523585 QT @CNN President Trump orders federal task force to investigate the Postal Service's finances https://trib.al/I5uxtvj http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DaqwU-mU8AAtRu2.jpg

RT @SenBooker We should all be deeply disturbed by Mike Pompeo's past associations with Islomophobes and anti-Muslim ideologues.   

Silence in the face of injustice lends strength to that injustice. Our leadership must always stand up to bigotry in all forms. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/984596832264343552/pu/img/aiXp8LrbHyYCjPfZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/984596832264343552/pu/vid/320x180/QIWfpEHPy74Gvhph.mp4

The main reason for the financial problems at the Postal Service stems from a 2006 mandate forcing it to pre-fund 75-years of retiree health benefits to employees who haven’t been born yet. No other business or government agency is burdened with such an absurd requirement.
